ctrlList.tipText: I am a DYLoaer inside a DYArea, and I can not be seen for now.

ctrlList.text:
Note: DYSignal is the object of signal transmited 
in DYQML system. Each controller inherit from 
DControllerBase can generate user event and 
emit a signal including DYSignal info. Press the 
controls below will emit a DYSignal, and the info 
will be displayed in the Pop-up Area.

ctrlList.tipText: This is a area contain 4 option

ctrlList.name: ComboBox
ctrlList.tipText: A ComboBox Control deliver a more complex signal.
This is a area contain 4 switch

ctrlList.text: Checkbox Group 4 (Change Size and Font Size):

Hint: The DYLoader control can select 
the DYArea that needs to be loaded 
based on the content of the dSignal. 
The form of the control that triggers 
it is unrestricted, as long as it can emit 
a dSignal corresponding to the sigId 
and the corresponding subInfo. The 
DYLoader loads on demand, loading 
only one DYArea at a time, and does 
not load all DYAreas at once.

ctrlList.tipText: This is a area contain 4 option

ctrlList.name: ComboBox
ctrlList.tipText: A ComboBox Control deliver a more complex signal.
This is a area contain 4 option
